Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 196th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off Willie Wright (BRO)...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2015...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/22/2016 to a 4-year deal worth $5,836,016 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Colorado on 6/14/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2017, hitting .481 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 10/6/2017...
Traded from Atlanta to New York on 4/16/2019 (Going to ATL: P Marc Jenkins, 1B Nathan Carballosa. Going to NY: 1B Pablo Cabanillas)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/1/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $3,333,333 per year...
